thread.title_full: Beach Volleyball Kicks Off OVC Play at UT Martin This Weekend

author: BVM Sportsdesk
title: Beach Volleyball Kicks Off OVC Play at UT Martin This Weekend
text:
Beach Volleyball Kicks Off OVC Play at UT Martin This Weekend
Lindenwood Beach Volleyball kicks off its Ohio Valley Conference (OVC) season this weekend with four matches at the Skyhawks Beach Volleyball Complex against Tennessee Tech, Chattanooga, Morehead State, and UT Martin. The action starts on Friday, March 21, with a match against Tennessee Tech at 8:00 a.m. CT, followed by a clash with defending champions Chattanooga at 4:00 p.m. CT. They will wrap up the weekend on Saturday, March 22, facing Morehead State at 10:00 a.m. CT and UT Martin at 4:00 p.m. CT. The Lions look to build on their strong start this season, where they have already achieved seven wins.
- Lindenwood has a 7-6 overall record this season.
- The Lions have a perfect 6-0 record against
McKendree, including a recent 5-0 sweep.
- Lindenwood is predicted to finish fifth in the OVC standings.
- Chattanooga is favored to win the conference, receiving 10 of 12 first-place votes.
After this OVC weekend, Lindenwood will host Eastern Illinois on March 29 for their first home match of the season at 2:00 p.m. CT.
The upcoming OVC matches will be crucial for Lindenwood's standing and confidence as they seek to improve upon last season's performance, aiming for a successful campaign in the competitive landscape of NCAA beach volleyball.
Read more at Lindenwood University Athletics
